inclusion.criterion: head CT showed a significant amount of blood in her right ventricle
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: cerebral angiogram was done which showed abnormal vasculature with a draining vein from L temporal lobe penetrating deep white matter consistent with AVM
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who had surgeries for malignancy suspicion or pelvic inflammatory disease
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: women with pectouteropexy procedure were not included into the study
exclusion.label: triggers
